name: WordHaiku
0:
”Alexa ask Word Haiku”
”Open Word Haiku and tell me a poem”
”Search Word Haiku for a haiku”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word haiku
des:
Listen to haikus (short poems) based on the Word of God. Be reminded of the Father's great love, undeserving grace, and tender mercy.

Simply say one of the following:
"Alexa, let's hear from Word Haiku"
"Alexa, can you share a poem from Word Haiku?"
"Alexa, use Word Haiku to read me something"
"Alexa, start Word Haiku and read me a poem"
"Alexa, I wanna hear something from Word Haiku"

Send us an email with your comments or suggestions at Word_Haiku@bezalelai.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
